html:
Why the new photo cutout feature is the best

Ever wanted to drop a cut-out of your cat into all your other photos or make her into a sticker to send in your messages? Well, you no longer have to be an expert in Photoshop to do this.

iOS 16 has plenty of awesome new features but Live Objects is probably the best one. It identifies a prominent or foregrounded item within your photos and can produce cutouts of it automatically, without you having to spend hours on end cropping around it.

Why the new photo cutout feature is the best

Take, for example, a picture of your cat sprawled out on your bed. On iOS 16, your iPhone will now automatically detect your cat in the foreground of the picture.

Why the new photo cutout feature is the best

If you long-press on your cat, you will be able to tap copy, and when you try to paste it into a message or onto another photo in an editing app, a cut-out of your cat will appear there, perfectly cropped. No bed, just cat.

Why the new photo cutout feature is the best

The new feature is super easy to use and comes with endless possibilities.
